short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Benevolist.org extension simplifies the donation process to help increase the number donations for all your item collection drives.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add items from top-brand retailers to create the perfect drive for all of your charitable collection drives when you use Benevolist.org. 

With our “Add to Benevolist.org Button" extension, you can quickly and easily add items from any of our merchant partners (Walmart, The Home Depot and Target) to your drives on Benevolist.org. Streamline your charitable food, toy, clothing drives and more, while easily tracking the progress as your donors purchase much-needed items.

You’ll be amazed at how Benevolist.org helps make your work so much easier and more efficient. And your donors will love contributing to the success of all your charitable donation drives.
